languages.text: {n}Старуха подносит кипу свитков как можно ближе к носу, механические окуляры щелкают при каждом ее движении.{/n} "Верно. Верно. Подтверждаю. Здесь все в порядке. Здесь тоже. Ах, печать немного смазана..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Старуха подносит кипу свитков как можно ближе к носу, механические окуляры щелкают при каждом ее движении.{/n} "Верно. Верно. Подтверждаю. Здесь все в порядке. Здесь тоже. Ах, печать немного смазана..."
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: {n}The old woman holds the documents close so that they are almost touching her nose, her mechanical ocular lenses clicking incessantly.{/n} "Yes. Yes. Confirmed. Everything is in order. And this one. Ah, the seal is smudged slightly..."
languages.original_text: {n}Старуха подносит кипу свитков как можно ближе к носу, механические окуляры щелкают при каждом ее движении.{/n} "Верно. Верно. Подтверждаю. Здесь все в порядке. Здесь тоже. Ах, печать немного смазана..."

traits.locale_text: {n}The old woman holds the documents close so that they are almost touching her nose, her mechanical ocular lenses clicking incessantly.{/n} "Yes. Yes. Confirmed. Everything is in order. And this one. Ah, the seal is smudged slightly..."
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: {n}老妇人紧紧握住了文件，几乎贴在了鼻子上。她的机械镜片不停地发出咔嚓声。{/n}“没错，没错，已经确认了。一切都很妥当，这里也没问题。啊，封条稍微有点污损了……”
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman holds the documents close so that they are almost touching her nose, her mechanical ocular lenses clicking incessantly.{/n} "Yes. Yes. Confirmed. Everything is in order. And this one. Ah, the seal is smudged slightly..."

traits.locale_text: {n}老妇人紧紧握住了文件，几乎贴在了鼻子上。她的机械镜片不停地发出咔嚓声。{/n}“没错，没错，已经确认了。一切都很妥当，这里也没问题。啊，封条稍微有点污损了……”
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: {n}La mujer se acerca los documentos hasta que casi le tocan la nariz y sus lentes mecánicas no dejan de chasquear.{/n} «Sí. Sí. Confirmado. Todo en regla. Vaya, este sello está un poco emborronado...».
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman holds the documents close so that they are almost touching her nose, her mechanical ocular lenses clicking incessantly.{/n} "Yes. Yes. Confirmed. Everything is in order. And this one. Ah, the seal is smudged slightly..."

traits.locale_text: {n}La mujer se acerca los documentos hasta que casi le tocan la nariz y sus lentes mecánicas no dejan de chasquear.{/n} «Sí. Sí. Confirmado. Todo en regla. Vaya, este sello está un poco emborronado...».
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: {n}印章長は鼻に触れそうなほどの距離で書類を持っている。彼女の機械式眼鏡が絶え間なくカチカチ音を立てていた。{/n}「ええ、ええ。確認しました。何も問題ありませんね。ではこちらを。あら、押印が少々かすれていますね…」
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman holds the documents close so that they are almost touching her nose, her mechanical ocular lenses clicking incessantly.{/n} "Yes. Yes. Confirmed. Everything is in order. And this one. Ah, the seal is smudged slightly..."

traits.locale_text: {n}印章長は鼻に触れそうなほどの距離で書類を持っている。彼女の機械式眼鏡が絶え間なくカチカチ音を立てていた。{/n}「ええ、ええ。確認しました。何も問題ありませんね。ではこちらを。あら、押印が少々かすれていますね…」
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: {n}La vieille femme tient les documents si près de ses yeux qu'ils touchent presque son nez, et ses lorgnons mécaniques émettent force cliquetis.{/n} « Oui. Oui. Affirmatif. Tout est en ordre. Quant à celui-ci... Ah, je vois que le sceau a un peu bavé... »
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman holds the documents close so that they are almost touching her nose, her mechanical ocular lenses clicking incessantly.{/n} "Yes. Yes. Confirmed. Everything is in order. And this one. Ah, the seal is smudged slightly..."

traits.locale_text: {n}La vieille femme tient les documents si près de ses yeux qu'ils touchent presque son nez, et ses lorgnons mécaniques émettent force cliquetis.{/n} « Oui. Oui. Affirmatif. Tout est en ordre. Quant à celui-ci... Ah, je vois que le sceau a un peu bavé... »
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: {n}Die alte Frau hält die Dokumente so dicht vor ihre Augen, dass sie fast die Nase berühren, und ihre mechanischen Linsen klicken unaufhörlich.{/n} "Ja. Ja. Bestätigt. Alles in Ordnung. Und das hier ... Ah, das Siegel ist leicht verschmiert ..."
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman holds the documents close so that they are almost touching her nose, her mechanical ocular lenses clicking incessantly.{/n} "Yes. Yes. Confirmed. Everything is in order. And this one. Ah, the seal is smudged slightly..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die alte Frau hält die Dokumente so dicht vor ihre Augen, dass sie fast die Nase berühren, und ihre mechanischen Linsen klicken unaufhörlich.{/n} "Ja. Ja. Bestätigt. Alles in Ordnung. Und das hier ... Ah, das Siegel ist leicht verschmiert ..."
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: {n}Yaşlı kadın, belgeleri öylesine yakın tutuyor ki neredeyse burnuna değiyorlar. Mekanik oküler mercekleri, durmak bilmeden tıkırdıyor.{/n} "Evet. Evet. Onaylandı. Her şey usulüne uygun. Bu da öyle. Ah, mührün üstüne hafif bir leke bulaşmış..."
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman holds the documents close so that they are almost touching her nose, her mechanical ocular lenses clicking incessantly.{/n} "Yes. Yes. Confirmed. Everything is in order. And this one. Ah, the seal is smudged slightly..."

traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals
